plot: She's there through the good, but she's there to make it bad. She's the worst best friend that you could ever have.
title: Worst Best Friend
plot_es: She's there through the good, but she's there to make it bad. She's the worst best friend that you could ever have.
plot_en: She's there through the good, but she's there to make it bad. She's the worst best friend that you could ever have.
